code: import canUseDOM from"../../../modules/canUseDom";export default function createCSSStyleSheet(id,rootNode,textContent){if(canUseDOM){var root=rootNode!=null?rootNode:document;var element=root.getElementById(id);if(element==null){element=document.createElement('style');element.setAttribute('id',id);if(typeof textContent==='string'){element.appendChild(document.createTextNode(textContent));}if(root instanceof ShadowRoot){root.insertBefore(element,root.firstChild);}else{var head=root.head;if(head){head.insertBefore(element,head.firstChild);}}}return element.sheet;}else{return null;}}
